title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mackinac Island, Michigan
content:
Photo submitted by Jason Vazzano, “Great day for a loop on the auto free island of Mackinac with great views of the Mackinac Bridge. (The longest suspension bridge between anchorages in the Western Hemisphere)” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mackinac Island, Michigan appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
